participant_2.background:
I play classical music on my violin to relax after a long day of teaching lessons.
I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people.
My family encourages me to eat healthy foods and get plenty of exercise.
My favorite people are my pets, Felix and Emmy.
I rode my horse across the countryside as I enjoyed the fresh air and the sun.

content.text: I've been trying to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
Have you tried using social media?
Yeah, I have a Facebook and Instagram page, but I'm not sure how to get people to find them.
Maybe you could try running a contest or giveaway. That would get people's attention.
That's a great idea! I could offer a free juice to anyone who follows my page and tags a friend.
That would be a great way to get people to sign up for your email list.
I didn't even think of that! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
Hey, do you know how to play the violin?
I do! I play classical music on my violin to relax after a long day of teaching lessons.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
It's never too late to start!
Maybe I will! Thanks for the inspiration.
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
I'm glad I met you today!
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
